text:
We at Avo are still playing around with our distribution channels and we decided to re-purpose one of our best loved blog posts so far, the one about the Purpose Meeting into. Medium. Would love to hear your experience with Medium? We'll be careful to share content first on our own domain (<http://avo.app|avo.app>) but if you have any thoughts on how to use Medium in the best way as a Saas B2B brand, I'd love to learn more
<https://medium.com/@avo.app/how-to-get-your-product-metrics-right-3326cf1f40da>

attachments.title: How to Get Your Product Metrics Right
attachments.text: Meet Avo’s Purpose Meeting, prioritize the highest-impact lowest-effort tracking to understand its success in 30 minutes. Click to learn…
attachments.fallback: Medium: How to Get Your Product Metrics Right
